name: Halo The RPG - Collection
description:
Hi, my name is Repez and I am an Italian player and a big fan of Halo since its very first release on Xbox!

My passion led me to dedicate my time to several jobs, including a series of rpg-based video games for Windows.
I decided to bring them all together under one launcher so that you can play them one after the other, in their latest version and with fewer bugs.Below you can find the links to the various mirrors to download the installer of the launcher from which you can launch "Halo The RPG: Ep0, Ep1, Ep2" and also a very special interactive planetarium.Contents of the collection:

  • Hub launcher for games
  • Halo The RPG: Episode 0
  • Halo The RPG: Episode 1
  • Halo The RPG: Episode 2
  • Halo Planetarium

Screenshots:


I hope you can have fun, although the games are only available in Italian.
